Recommendations: To ensure safe keeping of donated laboratory equipment, memorandum receipt be issued to end users.
The administration may consider to conduct seminars and trainings for faculty and staff on maintenance and proper care of equipment/apparatus.
The administration may prioritize the construction of additional stock room for supplies and equipment in the laboratory.
To maximize the efficiency of the state of the art equipment and apparatus, proper handling and safekeeping is necessary.
Modification of laboratory rooms might be taken into consideration to accommodate additional equipment.
Immediate purchase of the additional materials and equipment needed by the program based on CMO guidelines is greatly encouraged.
